• ASL sign language video generator interface
  • Text input with autocomplete suggestions
  • Video element for sign sequence playback
    <input id="userText" placeholder="Enter text..." autocomplete="off"/>
    <video id="aslVideo" width="500" controls></video>

This HTML creates a web interface for converting text input into ASL sign sequences. Users enter text which triggers video playback when clicking the Play button. The layout includes auto-suggestions and a responsive video player for displaying sign language demonstrations.
